LAdy Sipre:

"Well, well, well" said LAdy Spira while she checked all those=
 activity in her new base "It' seems that something really big have appeare=
d... I should go there and watch..."

The femme took some of her drones and=
 a shuttle. While she was taking off she opened com link with Jottum and pt=
hers leaders "Helo"she said with a big smile"I guess that you're informed t=
hat the long lost group of cibertronians aren't no longer lost... some of t=
hem it's seems that are appearing, and I guess that ... we should help..."
